resources.string: Indicates multiple options for the resource from which the client may choose. For example, this code could be used to present multiple video format options, to list files with different extensions, or to suggest word sense disambiguation.
The server cannot or will not process the request due to an apparent client error (e.g., malformed request syntax, invalid request message framing, or deceptive request routing).
The requested resource could not be found but may be available in the future. Subsequent requests by the client are permissible
A generic error message, given when an unexpected condition was encountered and no more specific message is suitable.
